reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress absolutely gorgeous and ideal for formal occasions, with a perfect fit that showcases just the right amount of skin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, buy it!!!
items.body: I literally just took the dress out and tried it on and had to hop onto Amazon to do a quick review. I am going to a masquerade party so needed a more dramatic looking dress. I am bottom heavy and have gained a few pounds in the past couple of months so I’m kind of in between between sizes L and XL. Some of the new weight is around my stomach and have a bit of a booty. So I haven’t been feeling like buying new things. Just tried it on and omg it was perfect. I ordered a Large and it fit perfectly. The quality was 10 times better than I had anticipated because let’s be real sometimes clothes online look good, but the material is a little bit flimsy. This is not it. It’s a nice thick quality, the sleeves stand up dramatically, and the draping in the front hide any sign of tummy rolls. The material is thick so doesn’t show any cellulite or dimples. It does run more on the slightly larger size that’s why the Large fit me perfectly. Very comfortable. The slit is high enough to be sexy but not so high that it’s tricky to walk around. I’m actually excited now to go to this party. Get the dress!!! Read more
items.author: MML

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars An Alluring Stunner: Memoriesea Women's Sexy Deep V Neck Puff Sleeve Backless Gown
items.body: I recently had the pleasure of wearing the Memoriesea Women's Sexy Deep V Neck Puff Sleeve Side Split Ruched Backless Gown Dress for a formal night on my Virgin Voyages cruise, and I must say, it was a showstopper! This dress accentuated my curves in all the right places, making me feel incredibly confident and glamorous throughout the evening. The deep V-neckline added a touch of sensuality without being overly revealing. It created a captivating focal point that drew attention to my décolletage, allowing me to feel both elegant and alluring. The strategically placed side split revealed just the right amount of leg, adding a subtle hint of seduction as I walked. One of the most notable features of this gown was the puff sleeves. They added a touch of drama and femininity to the overall silhouette, making me feel like a true goddess. The ruched detailing on the back was an exquisite touch, enhancing the gown's allure and creating a visually captivating effect. The backless design was a bold statement that left a lasting impression. The dress showcased just the right amount of skin, exuding confidence and sophistication. It offered a perfect balance between elegance and allure, making it an ideal choice for a formal occasion or a special event. The fabric was of exceptional quality, hugging my curves comfortably and gracefully. It had a slight stretch to it, ensuring a perfect fit and allowing me to move with ease. The attention to detail in the construction was evident, with meticulous stitching and well-crafted finishes. Overall, the Memoriesea Women's Sexy Deep V Neck Puff Sleeve Side Split Ruched Backless Gown Dress is a breathtaking piece that is sure to turn heads wherever you go. It offers a unique blend of elegance and sexiness, perfectly suited for formal events, cocktail parties, or special occasions. With this dress, I felt like the epitome of confidence and sophistication, creating memories that will last a lifetime. Read more
items.author: Sumnfun

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful dress
items.body: Excellent dress, has very much a red carpet feel. Fits like a glove - I ordered large, I am 5’9” and 185 lbs, bra size D. Very flattering and good quality fabric. Also, boobs are not falling out despite the low cleavage. Read more
items.author: Olga

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE it! Great quality too.
items.body: This dress is absolutely STUNNING! I sized down as the material is stretchy and gives support plus I’m a B cup. It holds everything in place! Amazed at the fact it’s cheap BUT looks expensive and excellent quality. Worth the money and you can definitely wear this more than once (since it’s black). Great for formal evenings, weddings… Read more
items.author: Tina

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The fit is iffy
items.body: I looked pretty cute in this but the deep V is DEEP. My boobs kept popping out all night. The fit of the dress was slightly off and a little too big on some areas and fitting in others. The quality of the material was excellent but it has a smell that took a few days to disappear. I would've taken it to the cleaners but it arrived on a Friday night and the event was on a Sunday. I don't know if I'll ever wear it again and I definitely wouldn't buy it again. Now I know why everyone was saying they took it to the tailor but if you buy an inexpensive dress do you want to take it to a tailor? Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality!
items.body: I bought this to create a costume with removable pieces so that I could enjoy the dress on its own as well! Perfect fit and very beautiful . material is thicker quality. Very Pleased! Read more
items.author: Dorisa Paulson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy the dress!!
items.body: Beautiful dress! Fit perfectly- very true to size. The material is soft and breathable. I am a 38 DDD and don’t need a bra because the top fits well. Received a ton of compliments on it! Read more
items.author: Nichole S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great material, beautiful color and comfortable.
items.body: Great dress! Flattering and stylish. I purchased a size medium, I'm 167 pounds and size 36DD. Read more
items.author: Spaugh and Favors Family

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Ruched V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Split Ruched V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
